title: Eddie Murphy Is Going on Tour in 2020
text:
Photo: Emma McIntyre/Getty Images for Netflix

We’re going to have to decide what to call this Eddie Murphy resurgence. The Murphyssance? Eddie-geddon? Ed-Ed Redemption 2? That one’s stupid, but at least it acknowledges that an Ed-Ed Redemption 1 was attempted with Tower Heist. Regardless of what you call it, another work in the Murphyssance canon has been confirmed. Speaking on the Present Company with Krista Smith podcast, Murphy said “Next year I am going to tour, do some stand-up.” Murphy gave no further details, but a standup tour is one of many projects he has in the offing. Dolemite Is My Name is coming to Netflix soon, and rumor has it that Murphy is in talks with the streaming service to do a standup special. And Murphy is returning to Saturday Night Live December 21.
description: Eddie Murphy confirmed on a Netflix podcast that he will be returning to stand-up comedy next year. He said on Present Company with Krista Smith that he will go on tour next year. Add to that Dolemite, an SNL appearance, and a rumored special.
